title: READY FOR WAR
itunes:title: READY FOR WAR
itunes:subtitle: Motiversity
description:
READY FOR WAR! If you're willing to put in the time and the effort every single day, even when you don't feel like it, you're ready for something more. You were created to do great things, it's time to reap the rewards!


Best Motivational Speeches Compilation featuring new motivational speeches by Motiversity and some of the best inspirational speeches ever from Walter Bond (https://bit.ly/WalterBondMotiversity), Coach Pain (https://bit.ly/CoachPainMotiversity), Mat Wilson (https://bit.ly/MattWilsonMotiversity), Elliot Hulse (https://bit.ly/ElliottHulseMotiversity), and many more. Music by Really Slow Motion (https://bit.ly/RSMMusic), Scott Buckley (https://www.youtube.com/c/ScottBuckley), Succession (https://bit.ly/SecessionStudiosYouTube), and Whitesand (https://www.youtube.com/c/WhitesandComposer).


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
